Set.Text: In addition to the [ICON_RESEARCH] Science output of the Library it replaces, the Royal Library also has a Great Work of Writing slot, it provides extra XP to Units trained in this city and increases the speed of production of military units. Only the Assyrians may build it.

Unique Assyrian Library replacement. +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for every 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in this City. Land units trained in this City receive 10 XP. It has a slot for a Great Work of Writing which, when filled, gives 10 XP to all Units. Also receive +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] when building Military Units.
